item.title: Creating my blogdown blog
item.description: 1 My first post! 2 What is Blogdown? 3 What to do?? 1 My first post! Ok so here goes. First blogdown post is happening right here! H/T and thankyou to Rebecca Barter on twitter. Her simple tweet got me to bite the bullet and actually startâ€¦. No more talking about Future Kristy. So, I thought the best first blog should be to detail this process. Maybe so I can do it again?
